import React, {useState} from 'react' import './tradeblock.css' import jersey from '../assets/basketball-jersey.png' import TeamGraph from '../Holdings/TeamGraph' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import TBteamExpand from './TBteamExpand' import moment from 'moment' const TBteamCard = (props) => { //props const t = props.t //states const [show, setShow] = useState(false) //get the percent change on right middle const getPercentChange = () => { let weekAgo = moment().subtract(7,'d').format('YYYYMMDD'); let priceChange = (t.lastSoldPrice - t.prices[weekAgo]).toFixed(2) return priceChange } return(
{setShow(!show)}}>
sim{t.team}
Shares: 2
${t.lastSoldPrice && t.lastSoldPrice.toFixed(2)} = 0 ? "tbtc-price-change green" : "tbtc-price-change red"} > {getPercentChange()}%
Bid
Ask

{t.highestBidPrice && t.highestBidPrice.toFixed(2)}
{t.lowestAskPrice && t.lowestAskPrice.toFixed(2)}
{show && }
) } export default TBteamCard
